#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

#define ll long long
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back

#define MOD 1000000007LL

int main(){
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	while (t--){
		string s;
		int k;
		cin >> s >> k;
		int r = 0;
		for (int i = 0; i < s.size(); i++){
			r = (r * 10 + (s[i] - '0')) % k;
		}
		if (r == 0) cout << "YES" << endl;
		else cout << "NO" << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
